casebody.data:
David M. Pierson v. State of Connecticut et al. (8111)

Spallone, O’Connell and Norcott, Js.

Argued March 8 decision released March 14, 1990 David S. Golub, with whom, on the brief, was Tanina Rostain, for the appellant (petitioner). Harry Weller, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and Mary Elizabeth Baran, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (respondent). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
